STRN.AS.summary: Stern Groep N.V. operates as an automotive retail and services company in the Netherlands. The company operates through Dealergroup Stern, Stern Mobility Solutions, Stern Car Services, and Other segments. The Dealergroup Stern segment engages in the sale of new and used passenger cars and light commercial vehicles; and provision of maintenance and repair services for passenger cars and light commercial vehicles. The Stern Mobility Solutions segment provides car rental, fleet management, and e-mobility services, as well as sells financial and other mobility products to small and medium-sized enterprises. The Stern Car Services segment offers car body repair and passenger cars maintenance services; and interiors fitting services for light commercial vehicles. The company also provides used-car warranty, car insurance, and lettering services, as well as parts. It sells cars under various brands, including Abarth, Alfa Romeo, Dacia, Fiat, Ford, Jaguar, Jeep, Kia, Land Rover, Mercedes-Benz, Mitsubishi Motors, Nissan, Opel, Renault, Smart, Subaru, and Volvo. Stern Groep N.V. is headquartered in Amsterdam, the Netherlands.
